data.name: Clea 2 - Chaos OST
data.detailed_description:
This DLC features two tracks used in the final chapters of Clea 2. Please note every other track are from sound libraries, so I do not have the rights to feature them. Thank you for your understanding. Please enjoy these two tracks from composer Jan Hehr!

Tracks:

1: Clash of Chaos
2: War Maiden
